title: Clostridium ramosum alone caused Fournier's gangrene in an older Chinese patient with abnormal interleukin levels: A rare case report
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Hongjian Ji, Wei Shen, Xiaohua Zhou, Linlin Zhang, Xin Zhao, Qinfang Tang, Cheng Guo
